thread.title: Shaun Gardner
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Shaun Gardner

author: Shaun Gardner
title: Shaun Gardner
text:
I have used T Shirt Studio for over a year now. I have to say they are one of the most professional businesses I have encountered. Firstly the actual product from basic t shirts through to the numerous Hoodies are all of excellent quality for very reasonable prices. I and my customers live them. The printing is bright sharp and vivid.
The templates for choosing your desired product and uploading your design are quite simply superb. So easy to use.
Postage is usually prompt and inexpensive.
On just 2 occasions have I had to deal with customer service. One for late delivery and one for a slight misplaced printing. On both occasions my minor complaints were dealt with immediately and to mine and my customers satisfaction.
A delightful company to do business with. I really can't imagine going anywhere else.I can only highly recommend T Shirt Studio.
Thanks guys. You most definitely ROCK!
